title: Table 137 - Row 1
clause_text: Provision and Location: Dimensio ns and slopes | Kerb Ramps are to be provided where the vertical rise is less than 0.15m, located or protected to prevent obstruction by parked vehicles and should be free from any obstruction such as signposts, traffic lights, etc.: The gradient of a kerb ramp should not be steeper than 1:12, the flared sides should not be more than 1:10 and width should not be less than 0.9 m.

headers: Kerb Ramps are to be provided where the vertical rise is less than 0.15m, located or protected to prevent obstruction by parked vehicles and should be free from any obstruction such as signposts, traffic lights, etc.
values: The gradient of a kerb ramp should not be steeper than 1:12, the flared sides should not be more than 1:10 and width should not be less than 0.9 m.
